visual.name: Filter
visual.description: Powerviz Filter is an advanced Power BI slicer(Free visual) that applies a page-level filter to the data. It stands out for its user-friendly design and customization flexibility, with developer-friendly wizard. This filter comes with advanced features including default selection, display mode, single/multiple selections, multiple themes and templates, hierarchy controls, slicer sync mode, and full customization options, enhancing its overall functionality.
